description: Aspose.Words for .NET class library supports DOC, DOCX, RTF, HTML, OpenDocument, PDF, XPS, EPUB and other formats. With Aspose.Words you can generate, modify, convert, render and print documents without utilizing Microsoft Word®
releaseNotes:
There are 97 improvements and fixes in this regular monthly release. The most notable are:

• Improvements in style handing in Tables, Format Revisions
• Improvements and resiliency code for ODT, RTF and DOCX
• DrawingML Charts 3D mode rendering implemented
• VML perspective shadows rendering implemented
• Outline rendering to PDF and XPS improved
• Multi-level bookmark rendering supported
• PDF rendering performance improved for documents with images
• Improved clipping of text boxes
• Fixed issue with missing footnotes in complex page layout

This release introduces the new features, enhancements and fixes to the excptions/bugs as detailed below:

• New features
WORDSNET-7113	Support rendering of 3D Charts
WORDSNET-7132	Support pyramid charts.
WORDSNET-7440	Expose property for Shape to detect 3D shapes
WORDSNET-7774	Support 3D Column/Bar charts.
WORDSNET-7775	Support cone charts.
WORDSNET-7776	Support cylinder charts.
WORDSNET-7777	Support 3D line charts.
WORDSNET-7778	Support pie 3D charts.
WORDSNET-7779	Support area 3D charts.
WORDSNET-7790	Support rendering Cartesian axis plane in 3D mode.
WORDSNET-7834	Support "Do full justification the way WordPerfect 6.x for Windows does" compatibility option
WORDSNET-7843	Support export to FixedPage HTML.
WORDSNET-7862	Development of attributes inheritance model
WORDSNET-7906	Read characterSet attribute (strict OOXML).
WORDSNET-7927	Publish this month's blog post and public API changes
WORDSNET-7955	Support rendering of bubbles in 3D mode.

• Enhancements
WORDSNET-3906	Rewrite PDF signing code to avoid using X509Certificate2
WORDSNET-5290	Consider making a single data source merge duplicate regions
WORDSNET-6823	Issue with paragraph borders in TextBox
WORDSNET-7110	Shadow effect of TextBox Shape is not preserved in PDF
WORDSNET-7178	Add a warning to the PdfSaveOptions.NumeralFormat description that modifying this option can rebuild page layout
WORDSNET-7627	Support multi-level Bookmarks rendering
WORDSNET-7671	Improve outlines rendering to PDF, XPS and SWF
WORDSNET-7754	Implement support of perspective shadows.
WORDSNET-7755	Implement support of additional shadow styles.
WORDSNET-7811	EULA 28th August 2012 update
WORDSNET-7861	Big square shape is colored incorrectly while rendered.
WORDSNET-7863	Create required method for testing Fixed Html output.
WORDSNET-7865	Investigate what save options are required for Fixed Html.
WORDSNET-7904	Express: EULA 28th August 2012 update
WORDSNET-7907	CustomDocumentProperties are not retrieved in the order they were added
WORDSNET-7916	Conversion from doc to tiff - black text in colored background produced solid black output

WORDSNET-7947	Investigate why does Aspose.Words add a blank Paragraph at the start of Bookmark
